## Water Depth at Dam

```{r}
#| label: fig-depth_series
#| fig-cap: "Water depth at Flynn Lake dam, outlet for Pike Chain of Lakes, by date. Date ticks are shown at midnight."
ggplot(data=dat,mapping=aes(x=DateTime,y=Depth)) +
  geom_line(linewidth=2,color="blue4") +
  geom_point(shape=21,fill="white",color="blue4",size=2) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=basedep,linetype="dashed",size=1) +
  annotate(geom="text",x=min(dat$DateTime),y=1.92,label="Summer Baseline",
           hjust=0.1,vjust=-0.5) +
  scale_x_datetime(date_breaks="1 week",date_minor_breaks="1 day",
                   date_labels="%B-%d") +
  scale_y_continuous(name="Depth (ft)",expand=expansion(mult=0),
                     limits=c(1.8,2.5),breaks=scales::breaks_width(0.1)) +
  theme_minimal(base_size=12) +
  theme(panel.grid.minor.y=element_blank(),
        axis.title.x=element_blank())
```
